
# Methods

## Rolling evaluation
- Blocked per-token: train 120, cal 24, test 6; step 6.

## Models
### QRF (core)
- quantile_forest.RandomForestQuantileRegressor; tuned (Optuna); decay weights; τ ∈ {0.05, 0.10, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 0.90, 0.95}
- Calibration: residual quantile offsets by regime; median bias correction; isotonic non-crossing.

### Baselines
- LQR (statsmodels) same τ grid; non-crossing.
- LightGBM quantile; conformal λ for 80% interval + interpolation.

## Metrics & tests
- Pinball loss; empirical coverage + width; Diebold–Mariano tests; optional WIS.

## Key equations
- Pinball loss, DM statistic (list equations here with labels eq:pinball, eq:dm).
